content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <metadata xml:lang="en"> <Esri> <CreaDate>20150223</CreaDate> <CreaTime>16382000</CreaTime> <ArcGISFormat>1.0</ArcGISFormat> <ArcGISstyle>Item Description</ArcGISstyle> <SyncOnce>TRUE</SyncOnce> </Esri> <dataIdInfo> <idAbs>MarineCadastre.gov themed service for public consumption featuring layers associated with ocean energy featured in the National Viewer. This map service presents spatial information about MarineCadastre.gov services across the United States and Territories in the Web Mercator projection. The service was developed by the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), but may contain data and information from a variety of data sources, including non-NOAA data. NOAA provides the information \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdas-is\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd and shall incur no responsibility or liability as to the completeness or accuracy of this information. NOAA assumes no responsibility arising from the use of this information. The NOAA Office for Coastal Management will make every effort to provide continual access to this service but it may need to be taken down during routine IT maintenance or in case of an emergency. If you plan to ingest this service into your own application and would like to be informed about planned and unplanned service outages or changes to existing services, please register for our Data Services Newsletter (http://coast.noaa.gov/digitalcoast/publications/subscribe). For additional information, please contact the NOAA Office for Coastal Management (coastal.info@noaa.gov). </idAbs> <searchKeys> <keyword>Oceans</keyword> <keyword>Marine</keyword> <keyword>National</keyword> <keyword>renewable</keyword> <keyword>offshore</keyword> <keyword>energy</keyword> <keyword>coastal</keyword> <keyword>facilities</keyword> <keyword>deepwater ports</keyword> <keyword>marine hydrokinetic projects</keyword> <keyword>MHK</keyword> <keyword>wind</keyword> <keyword>technology depth zones</keyword> <keyword>DOD</keyword> <keyword>mission compatibility assessments</keyword> <keyword>resource potential</keyword> <keyword>ocean wave</keyword> <keyword>tidal stream</keyword> </searchKeys> <idPurp>MarineCadastre.gov themed service for public consumption featuring layers associated with ocean energy featured in the National Viewer.</idPurp> <idCredit>MarineCadastre.gov</idCredit> <resConst> <Consts> <useLimit>None</useLimit> </Consts> </resConst> <idCitation> <resTitle>Ocean Energy</resTitle> </idCitation> </dataIdInfo> <Binary> <Thumbnail> <Data EsriPropertyType="PictureX"></Data> </Thumbnail> </Binary> </metadata>
